pages.text: $(li)The Leather is a resistant material that can be dropped by Cows, Deers, Donkeys, Foxhounds, Goblos, Gooms, Hobgobs, Hoglins, Horses, Llamas, Mooblooms, Mooshrooms and Mules.$(br)$(li)They can be used in a Crafting Table to craft multiples items.

pages.title: Armors & Weapons
pages.text: $(br)$(l)        Armors$()$(br)$(li)Leather Armor$(li)Leather Horse Armor$(li)Leather Wolf Armor$(br2)$(l)        Weapons$()$(br)$(li)Pocket of Sand
$(li)The Leather can be found in Loot Chests too.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Rabbit Hide, Kangaroo Hide, or Bonded Leather too.
